Damn, wish i would have waited for this release. I was impatient and got a much smaller resolution last week. This one looks great.

And for those saying this movie sucked, i personally thought it was pretty good. For anyone that liked/loved the previous Pirates movies, you'll like/love this one just as much.

My only problem is that it seems Depp is just doing a parody of the Sparrow character now, which sorta bothered me especially at the beginning, but i guess i got used to him. IT just felt that Depp was doing an impersonation of Sparrow for most of the movie and it sorta ruined it for me. BUT, there's lots in this movie to redeem itself from Johnny's performance, especially in Barbosa, who, once again was my favourite character in the film, he really carries the movie and is captivating to watch every minute he's on screen.

Don't listen to the whiners, if you like the series, you will like this one. Thanks BOZX.
